question: Which of the following is going to be the official slogan of the FIFA Under-17 Women’s World Cup 2020?
explanation: The official slogan of the FIFA Under-17 Women’s World Cup 2020 is "Kick Off the Dream". India is the host country of the game for the year 2020. Due to the COVID-19 outbreak, the event got delayed and it is expected to be held in 2021.
